title: Firefighters learn areas they serve in training

content.question: Firefighters are often required to walk through local buildings and drive trucks around the areas they serve as part of their training. The most likely purpose of this type of training is to develop

topic.text: 3.9: Social, Cognitive, and Neurological Factors in Learning

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
